name: Ons@ught
description:
Made for the 2020 7drl challenge .

Participate in Onsl@ught the post apocalyptic game show where you can win fabulous post apocalypse prizes. You're given a gun and mow down room after room of robot, mutant, and insane humans in this roguelike game! You have to be quick thinking or you'll be surrounded and torn apart or back up into a stream of bullets. Plan your movement, shoot your enemies, and roll past a hail of gunfire towards your coveted prizes!

Features!

  • Marvel at the non-grid conforming ascii representation!
  • learn enemy actions and exploit them!
  • Randomly set up floors and randomized enemy line ups keep the game fresh!
  • Get tired of 2 authentic 8 bit chiptune tracks!
  • Hear the sound of every shot you make and every bullet you take!
  • Fill the screen with processor melting bullets!
  • See what the post apocalyptic world hands out as prizes!
  • and die again and again to 10 enemies and 10 bosses!
